* Search for: / / September 16, 2020 .
21 Tweet 0 A former high-ranking Chinese virologist appeared on “ to broadcast her accusation that the Chinese government “intentionally” unleashed Covid-19 on the world’s population.
SEE ALSO: Dr. Li-Meng Yan, who previously worked at a World Health Organization reference lab, told the Fox News host that the novel coronavirus is “actually is not from nature.
It is a manmade virus created in the lab,” and claims to have the evidence to back up her allegations.

When Carlson clarified that Yan was implying the Chinese government manufactured the virus, she replied , “Yes, exactly.” WATCH: Chinese virologist whistleblower Dr. Li-Meng Yan tells Tucker Carlson that COVID-19 was created and deliberately unleashed by the Chinese government: TUCKER: “You’re saying the Chinese government manufactured this virus?” YAN: “Yes exactly.” pic.twitter.com/vGFr73p8z6 — Daily Caller (@DailyCaller) September 16, 2020 Yan explained that the virus’s genome is as unique as a fingerprint, has the unusual characteristics that indicate it was modified by man.
“This virus is like Frankenstein,” she said.

“They can never get it from the nature.” In another interview , she alleged the virus came from a government-controlled lab in Wuhan and the notion that it could have originated in a wet market was “a smokescreen.” paper on Monday that claims “ biological characteristics that are inconsistent with a naturally occurring, zoonotic virus.” She told Carlson she plans to release another report detailing the scientific backing of her allegations.
The virologist asserts that she was silenced by her supervisors when she tried to whistleblow about virus transmission and fled to the United States in April out of fear for her life.

“The reason I came to the U.S. is because I deliver the message of the truth of Covid.” Yan told Carlson the scientific community is working with the Chinese Communist Party to suppress the truth about the virus’ origin.
When he questioned if the Chinese government released the virus into the world on purpose, she replied, “Yes, of course, it’s intentionally.
EDITORS NOTE: We at AAN appreciate you and your support of our work to counter the mainstream media narrative.
Please share our news with your friends and family and encourage them to sign up for our newsletter.
